snippet: Liverpool had to combat "wild football" from Everton before a last-gasp winner from Sadio Mane earned the visitors a 1-0 derby win at Goodison Park on Monday, said manager Juergen Klopp....
lead_paragraph: Liverpool had to combat "wild football" from Everton before a last-gasp winner from Sadio Mane earned the visitors a 1-0 derby win at Goodison Park on Monday, said manager Juergen Klopp.

headline.main: Liverpool Had to Thwart Wild Everton Football, Says Klopp
headline.print_headline: Liverpool Had to Thwart Wild Everton Football, Says Klopp
